programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wgbow.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kpres = p4 ;pressure value krat = p5 ;position along string kvibf = 6.12723
kvib linseg 0, 0.5, 0, 1, 1, p3-0.5, 1 ; amplitude envelope for the vibrato. kvamp = kvib * 0.01 asig wgbow .7, 55, kpres, krat, kvibf, kvamp, 1 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 2048 10 1 ;sine wave
i 1 0 3 3 0.127236 i 1 + 3 5 0.127236 i 1 + 3 5 0.23
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
